alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Powhatan (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:57PM EDT until June 26 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHESTERFIELD...SOUTHEASTERN GOOCHLAND...NORTHWESTERN HENRICO...SOUTHWESTERN HANOVER AND EASTERN POWHATAN COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF RICHMOND... At 756 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wyndham to near Tuckahoe to near Moseley, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Tuckahoe, University Of Richmond, Bon Air and Wyndham around 800 PM EDT. Downtown Richmond, Lakeside and Laurel around 805 PM EDT. Richmond, Ashland, Randolph Macon College, Virginia Union University, Virginia Commonwealth University, East Highland Park and Glen Allen around 810 PM EDT. Mechanicsville around 815 PM EDT. Hanover and Bensley around 820 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Crozier, Vontay, Johnsons Springs, Elmont, Gilman, Solomons Store, Chamberlayne, Fine Creek Mills, Atlee and Ashcake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
